function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Non-compliance with government guidelines","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, higher risk of infection","Mitigation":"Education, communication, enforcement of guidelines","Technologies":"Digital communication tools, social media, surveillance technology","People":"General public, non-compliant individuals","Owner":"Government, health organizations"},{"Description":"Panic buying and stockpiling","Impact":"Shortages of essential goods, price gouging, increased risk of exposure in crowded spaces","Mitigation":"Supply chain management, rationing, public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Inventory management systems, online shopping platforms, public messaging systems","People":"Consumers, retail workers, suppliers","Owner":"Retailers, government, supply chain managers"},{"Description":"Belief that the threat is highly exaggerated","Impact":"Decreased adherence to guidelines, increased risk of infection for themselves and others","Mitigation":"Targeted messaging, education, debunking misinformation, social norms interventions","Technologies":"Social media monitoring, targeted advertising, fact-checking tools","People":"Non-compliant individuals, close contacts, general public","Owner":"Health organizations, government, social media platforms"}]}
